original_text: That they feared greatly, because Gibeon was a great city, as one of the royal cities, and because it was greater than Ai, and all the men thereof were mighty.
korean_text: 크게 두려워하였으니 이는 기브온은 왕도와 같은 큰 성임이요 아이보다 크고 그 사람들은 다 강함이라

sentences.original_text: because Gibeon was a great city
as one of the royal cities
and because it was greater than Ai
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 아이보다 더 컸기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and all the men thereof were mighty
